name: 09.19-Deeptools: plotProfile
description: This tool creates a profile plot for scores over sets of genomic regions. Typically, these regions are genes, but any other regions defined in BED will work. A matrix generated by computeMatrix is required

parameters.name: Input matrix
parameters.description: Matrix file from the computeMatrix tool. (default:None)

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: File name to save the image to. The file ending willbe used to determine the image format. The availableoptions are: 'png', 'eps', 'pdf' and 'svg', e.g.,MyHeatmap.png. (default: None)

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Title of the plot, to be printed on top of the generated image. Leave blank for no title

parameters.name: Samples label
parameters.description: Labels for the samples plotted. The default is to use the file name of the sample. The sample labels should be separated by spaces and quoted if a label itselfcontains a space E.g. –samplesLabel label-1 “label 2”
